multiQuestions.question: Which storage option provides very low latency for data access?
Which storage option shares access for multiple users and is comparable to NAS storage (on prem)?
What storage option has items stored by a flat address space and referenced by a unique key
What is the largest size an individual S3 file can be?
Which Storage Tier is good for when the access to the object will be unkown?
Which Storage Tier always puts and keeps objects in the Infrequent Access Tier?
Which Storage Tier has infrequent access and only duplicates objects across one AZ rather than across multiple AZs like the other Storage Tiers?
How long does it take for S3 INT Tier to move Frequent Access Tier to the Infrequent Access Tier?
What are the 3 retrieval options of S3 Glacier, from cheapest to most expensive?
How long can it take to retrieve an item from S3 Glacier using the Expedited retreival option
What does S3 INT stand for?
What does S3 S-IA stand for?
What does S3 Z-IA stand for?
What does S3 G-DA stand for?
For S3 Glacier, buckets are called ___ and objects are called ___
What do Lifecycle Rules do?
multiQuestions.answer: Provide an automatic method of managing the life of your data while it is being stored on S3. Such as moving to another S3 bucket, or deleting the object entirely after a period of time. (For cost saving)

booleanQuestions.question: S3 has an object hierarchy
booleanQuestions.popup: You can create folders for organization, but objects are retrieved by a unique key and do not depend on folders or hierarchies

booleanQuestions.question: S3 is highly available, durable, cost effective, widely accessible
By default, S3 data isn't duplicated to multiple AZs in your region
booleanQuestions.popup: Data is duplicated across multiple AZs in your region to increase durability and availabiily (depending on your Storage Class)

booleanQuestions.question: S3 buckets can have any name
booleanQuestions.popup: S3 buckets must have globally unique names

booleanQuestions.question: S3 Versioning is disabled by default
Once S3 Versioning is enabled, it can't be disabled
booleanQuestions.popup: It can only be suspended. All previous versions will still exist
